constraint.name: ca_verifactu_requerimientos_lines_registro
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (id_registro_factura) REFERENCES verifactu_registros_facturas (id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE

constraint.name: ca_verifactu_requerimientos_lines_requerimiento
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (id_requerimiento) REFERENCES verifactu_requerimientos (id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE
